data: Welcome to Mango! Initial dashboard with customizable widget layout (drag, drop, resize).
Added Calendar Widgets: View your schedule with Month and Daily calendar views.
Added Todos Widget: Manage your tasks directly on the dashboard.
Added Health Widgets: Track your daily steps with the Steps Tracker.
Connect Your Data: Link your Google Calendar and Google Health (for steps) accounts.
Manual Data Entry: Add Calendar events, Health steps, and Todo items manually.
Daily Summary Widget: Get a quick overview of your upcoming events, pending tasks, and step progress.
Data Source Management: View and manage connected accounts and manual entries via sidebar panels.
UI Enhancements: Added loading indicators and improved widget displays.
